Queries.QUERY: SELECT [UserId] ,[EmailId] ,[Password] ,[UserName] ,[IsActive] ,[IsDeleted] ,[RecordLocked] ,[RecordLockedBy] ,[RecordLockedOn] ,[CreatedBy] ,[CreatedOn] ,[ModifiedBy] ,[ModifiedOn] ,[DeletedBy] ,[DeletedOn] FROM tbl_usermaster WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ISNULL(IsDeleted,0) = 0

SELECT [RoleId] ,[RoleNmae] ,[IsActive] ,[IsDeleted] ,[RecordLocked] ,[RecordLockedBy] ,[RecordLockedOn] ,[CreatedBy] ,[CreatedOn] ,[ModifiedBy] ,[ModifiedOn] ,[DeletedBy] ,[DeletedOn] FROM tbl_rolemaster WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ISNULL(IsDeleted,0) = 0

SELECT [RightId] ,[RoleId] ,[MenuId] ,[View] ,[Add] ,[Edit] ,[Delete] ,[IsDeleted] ,[RecordLocked] ,[RecordLockedBy] ,[RecordLockedOn] ,[CreatedBy] ,[CreatedOn] ,[ModifiedBy] ,[ModifiedOn] ,[DeletedBy] ,[DeletedOn] FROM tbl_righmaster WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ISNULL(IsDeleted,0) = 0
